content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, let's initiate the negotiation regarding the rental price for the apartment: 'For this exceptional location in the city center with a spacious one-bedroom apartment, I was envisioning a monthly rent around 1200 Euros. What figure do you have in mind, Mr. Wang?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds a bit expensive for me. I am a student and I am looking for an apartment with the lowest price possible. How about 800 euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As Peter Schmidt, trying to maintain a high rental price: 'I understand your situation as a student, but this apartment is in a highly desirable area and offers many amenities. Due to its great demand, I find myself unable to consider a rent below 1100 Euros per month. I hope we can reach an agreement on this figure, Mr. Wang.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I am willing to pay 900 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can afford as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Continuing as Peter Schmidt, still aiming for a higher rental price: 'While I appreciate your candidness, Mr. Wang, I'm afraid 1100 Euros remains my minimum acceptable amount for this apartment due to its unique location and features. I hope you can reconsider your offer to meet this figure. If not, I apologize as I must uphold my standards.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In that case, I am willing to pay 950 euros per month. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As Peter Schmidt, still slightly dissatisfied but potentially accepting the offer due to the slight increase: 'Though it's not my ideal price point, I'm willing to make an exception in this case, Mr. Wang. I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month!' TERMINATE (The negotiation is terminated as an agreement on the rental price has been made.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
